snippet: The publisher, Arthur Sulzberger Jr., 64, has held the role since his father stepped down when he was 65, in 1992.
abstract: New York Times publisher Arthur Sulzberger Jr, aged 64, says company will name deputy publisher within two years.
lead_paragraph: The publisher, Arthur Sulzberger Jr., 64, has held the role since his father stepped down when he was 65, in 1992.

headline.main: New York Times Co. to Name Deputy Publisher Within Two Years
headline.print_headline: The Times Says It Will Name a Deputy Publisher Within Two Years
